qas.question: Though several torchbearers withdrew from the torch relay, the official website for China stated that Indian torch participants vowed to run for what?
What did Ayaan Ali Khan and Manavjit Singh Sandhu say should not be mixed?
Though four withdrew, it was reported that Indian torchbearers vowed to what?
Several torchbearers said what two things should not be combined?

context: Reports on the Delhi relay were similarly distinct. Despite intended torchbearers Kiran Bedi, Soha Ali Khan, Sachin Tendulkar and Bhaichung Bhutia all withdrawing from the event, the official Chinese website for the relay reported "Indian torchbearers vow to <a2_0>run for <a0_0>spirit of Olympics<a2_0/><a0_0/>", and quoted torchbearers Manavjit Singh Sandhu, Abhinav Bindra, Ayaan Ali Khan and Rajinder Singh Rahelu all stating that <a1_0><a3_0>sports and politics<a3_0/><a1_0/> should not be mixed.
